title: Flight Simulator 2020 - MSFS Update - New hotfix - available
description:
Asobo has released the hotfix for MSFS 2020 as announced earlier today. The hotfix is mandatory so you need to install it before you can play the game. The update itself is roughly 700MB so it might take some time before it has downloaded the update based on your internet connection speed.
